text: Wasteland 3 is a video game developed by inXile Entertainment and published by Deep Silver. It is a role-playing game. It is a sequel to Wasteland 2 (2014). It was released for Microsoft Windows, PlayStation 4 and Xbox One on August 28, 2020. A Linux and macOS port was released on December 17, 2020. ==Reception== The game received generally positive reviews upon release. It got a score of 85/100 from critics on review aggregator Metacritic. By December 2021, the game had more than 2 million players. It was nominated for the category of Best Role Playing at The Game Awards 2020. It was also nominated for "Role-Playing Game of the Year" at the 24th Annual D.I.C.E.
